title: Psychedelics & Deep Inner Work
subtitle: Working with shadow, trauma, and the depths
description: For those ready to go beyond basic preparation into the deeper territories. This course covers working with shadow material, trauma considerations, ego dissolution, mystical experiences, and the integration challenges that arise from profound experiences. Not for beginners—requires solid foundation and prior experience.

modules.title: Beyond the Basics
modules.description: What changes when you go deeper

modules.title: Shadow Encounters
modules.description: Meeting the parts of yourself you've avoided

modules.title: Trauma Considerations
modules.description: When old wounds surface—and when to seek support

modules.title: Ego Dissolution
modules.description: Understanding and navigating the loss of self

modules.title: Mystical Experiences
modules.description: Unity consciousness, entities, and the ineffable

modules.title: Challenging Integration
modules.description: When integration is hard—spiritual emergency and support

modules.title: Integration Traps
modules.description: Spiritual bypassing, inflation, and other pitfalls

whatYouLearn: Understand trauma considerations and when to seek help
Work skillfully with ego dissolution experiences
Recognize and avoid common integration traps
Know when professional support is needed
requirements: Access to integration support if needed

questions.question: What is shadow material in the context of psychedelic work?
options: Repressed or denied parts of the psyche that surface for integration
Bad trips that should be avoided

questions.question: When trauma surfaces during a psychedelic experience, what's most important?
options: Push through it no matter what
Stop immediately and never try again
Have support available and know your limits—some trauma needs professional help

questions.question: What is ego dissolution?
options: The temporary dissolution of the sense of separate self

questions.question: What is 'spiritual bypassing'?
options: Using spiritual concepts to avoid dealing with real psychological issues

questions.question: What is 'inflation' as an integration trap?
options: Believing you've become special, enlightened, or above ordinary life
